categories.title: Location Data
categories.name: Personal Information Collection
categories.description: The collection and the use of location data used for navigation purpose

categories.title: Measurement
categories.name: Location Data Processing
categories.description: The srorage of information or access to information that is already stored,on user device such as accessing advertising identifers and/or other identifiers and/or using cookies or other similar technology

categories.title: Content Delivery
categories.name: Analytics and Usage Data
categories.description: The collection of information about the user of a site to subsequently personalize advertising for them or other contents. i.e., on ohter site or apps. Typically the content or the site or the app

categories.title: Location Data1

categories.description: This category includes the display of targeted advertisements based on user data.
